description: Always wanted to learn to sew? Not quite sure how to get started? Have no fear, we’ve got you covered! Roxy, our resident sewing expert at Brit + Co, is going to walk you through everything you need to know to become a sewing rockstar. She’ll start by walking you through the pros and cons of different fabric types. From there, discover some of the most creative places we know to buy colorful fabrics and the right tools. Finally you’ll learn to sew not one, not two—but three different projects. Learn to make a cloth napkin, a pillowcase and a chic maxi skirt.
title: Sewing 101
